topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
"@Background Pony #E4FF":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5533046e636872398c862200#post_5533046e636872398c862200
Moral guardians don't alone have that power, rather companies that have the same ideological beliefs as moral guardians do have that power and are a severe threat to the internet.

I'm just going to use an analogy here for a second so please don't turn this into a discussion about gamergate.  SJW don't have much power; rather Gawker has a ton of power and therefor SJW have power.  Gamergate would have ended a long time ago if it wasn't for Gawker.

My point is that the companies in question are ideologically biased and therefore will use their power to push their agenda.
